definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights (ICCPR)
pinyin: gong1 min2 quan2 li4 he2 zheng4 zhi4 quan2 li4 guo2 ji4 gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 公民權利和政治權利國際公約

sentences.english: No bill of attainder or ex post facto Law shall be passed.
sentences.chinese: 不得通過公民權利剝奪法案或追溯既往的法律。

sentences.english: They have not contented themselves with wistful pleas formore democracy or civil rights.
sentences.chinese: 他們並不滿足於熱切的懇求更多的民族或者公民權利。

sentences.english: He said he opposed Negro citizenship.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他反對黑人擁有公民權利。

sentences.english: Becauseof the lack of it, citizen's right loses balance.
sentences.chinese: 公民遷徙權的缺失，導致公民權利的不平衡。

sentences.english: The civil rights bill carried by a large majority.
sentences.chinese: 公民權利法案獲得大多數同意而通過。

sentences.english: "Lithuania also scored top marks for their political rights and civil liberties, " says Greenwald.
sentences.chinese: 立陶宛在政治權力和公民權利方面也獲得了最高分。

definition: to stir up public sentiment by false statements (idiom)/to resort to demagogy
the right to be elected/the right to stand for election

definition: highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
